> November 30, 2025

## Recharge your batteries

ELECTRIC 7 got a rework to let you supercharge your ELECTRIC Pokémon. Artificial items are now named Tools, and only a subset of tools will be found with ARTIFICIAL synergy.

## Choose your starter

Stage 0 portal now works like other portal rounds, and lets you choose your starter Pokémon from a selection of three based on the portal symbols. Eevee is now a special starter option like Kecleon and Arceus.

## Items recrafted

Several items have been redesigned: Lucky Egg into HEAVY_DUTY_BOOTS, Fluffy Tail into SAFETY_GOGGLES, Choice Scarf into LOADED_DICE, Rotom Phone into SPELL_TAG... New tools and new gadgets are also available!
